LanguageData.BuildLaserRifle.label: 制造 单路光束步枪
LanguageData.BuildLaserRifle.description: Builds the One-Beam Laser Rifle. It is a fantastic laser rifle with Mechanoid technology that fires 1 energy beam. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the beam can catch on fire。
LanguageData.BuildHeavyLaserRifle.label: 制造 三路光束步枪
LanguageData.BuildHeavyLaserRifle.description: Builds the Tri-Beam Laser Rifle. It is a fantastic laser rifle with Mechanoid technology that fires 3 energy beams in succession. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the beam can catch on fire。
LanguageData.BuildBurstLaserRifle.label: 制造 多路光束步枪
LanguageData.BuildBurstLaserRifle.description: Builds the Penta-Beam Laser Rifle. It is a fantastic laser rifle with Mechanoid technology that fires 5 energy beams in succession. This weapon does not need to be reloaded. Targets hit by the beam can catch on fire。
LanguageData.BuildChargeRifle.label: 制造 R2 电荷步枪
LanguageData.BuildChargeRifle.description: Builds the R2 Charge Rifle, a charged-shot energy projectile rifle。
